sen.e: With the help and advice of Dokan OTA who was concerned, Ujiyori visited the capital to receive Yoshimasa's pardon in 1464, finally ending the internal discord within the Omori clan in 1478.

sen.e: After the death of Dokan OTA Ujiyori bacame the chief vassal with tremendous influence; however, Sadamasa's political style, such as tying a peace accord with Kogakubo Shigeuji ASHIKAGA only to immediately revoke it, began to invite estrangement from his vassals.
